IPSS symptom score ≥ 13 IPSS bother score > 2 ( see Appendix B IPSS questionnaire ) 5 . Baseline peak flow rate Qmax ≤ 15 cc/s void volume least 125 cc 1 . Neurogenic bladder , Parkinson 's disease 3 . Prior treatment urinary incontinence 4 . Micturition frequency AND urgency . Micturition frequency define > 8 micturition per 24 hour assess thorough subject history include question : `` On average , many time void 24 hour period ? // < 4 , 57 , 8 .
